stockfile.controllers

Class SFTPController

  • java.lang.Object
    • stockfile.controllers.SFTPController

  • public class SFTPController
extends java.lang.Object
    SFTP Controller contains all of the commands used to send and receive files over SSH. SFTP Controller contains all of the commands used to send and receive files over SSH.
    Author:
    Jeremy Wallace, Bahman Razmpa, Peter Lee

        Returns:

      • connect

        public void connect()
             throws com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException,
                    com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException
        Run the entire connection process to establish an SFTP connection and cd to the home directory.
        Throws:
        com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException - If the channel or session fails.
        com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException - If the SFTP channel fails or there is a problem finding the home directory.

      • close

        public void close()
        Close the connection

               throws java.lang.InterruptedException,

        Throws:

      • goToHomeDir

        public void goToHomeDir()
                 throws com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException
        Changes root directory to the users home stockfile directory.
        Throws:
        com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException - If there was a problem getting or creating this directory.

      • upload

        public boolean upload(java.lang.String filename)
               throws com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException,
                      java.io.IOException
        Uploads a file over SFTP
        Parameters:
        filename - The file name in the local PBJ file list to send.
        Returns:
        True if the file was sent.
        Throws:
        com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException - If there is an error during transmission.
        java.io.IOException - If there was a file stream error.

      • download

        public boolean download(java.lang.String filename)
                 throws com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException,
                        java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Downloads a file from the remote server.
        Parameters:
        filename - The remote file to download.
        Returns:
        True if the file is downloaded.
        Throws:
        com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException - If there is a problem downloading the file.
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the file is not found on the server.
        java.io.IOException - If there is a problem with the file stream.

      • restoreDB

        public static boolean restoreDB(java.lang.String location)
        Restores the database back to its original state with the latest .sql file from the Master.
        Parameters:
        location - Location of the stored SQL file.
        Returns:
        true if the database has been restored.

      • duplicate

        public void duplicate(java.lang.String filename)
               throws java.io.IOException,
                      com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException
        Duplicates a file locally and then uploads.
        Parameters:
        filename - File name to duplicate
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a file stream error occurs.
        com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException - If an error in uploading occurs.
